QuestData.Title: Rescue the Survivors!
QuestData.Description: The healing crystals are replenished, but that is not the only way we can help the injured. All draenei can tap the gift of the Naaru to heal. You must use this ability to heal one of the crash survivors.$b$bYou'll find most of the survivors in the areas to the west and northwest, but the crash scattered us all over the vale.$b$bThe survivors have suffered from exposure to the irradiated power crystals, so you should be able to find them by the red glow that surround them.$B$BYou must save them, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use your Gift of the Naaru ability on one of the Draenei Survivors spread throughout Ammen Vale, then return to Zalduun at the Crash Site in Ammen Vale.
QuestData.CompletionText: We'll survive this yet with your help.
QuestData.RewardText: The Light be praised! You've done what only a true $g hero : heroine; could have done, $N! The draenei you saved owes their continued life to your selflessness!$B$BPlease, take this supply pouch. You look like you can use it more than I.
